thread.section_title: Park Central Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good hotel in great location
thread.title_full: Good hotel in great location - Review of Park Central Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mark S
title: Good hotel in great location
text: This hotel is in a great location. Many attractions are in walking distance (such as Carnegie Hall, Times Square, Radio City, Central Park, Rockefeller Center) and the subway stop is 1 block away. Hotel facilities are fine. Staff was okay but not particularly friendly.
